sentences.sContent: The dollar fell by 24 percent against the yen (= decreased in value in relation to the yen ) between 1970 and 1973.
sentences.sCn: 在1970年至1973年间，美元对日元的汇率下跌了24%。

synos.tran: 日元（日本货币单位）；渴望

trans.tranCn: 日元（日本货币单位）；渴望
trans.tranOther: the standard unit of money in Japan: symbol ¥
